name: SVC_LN_INFO_3
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The SVC_LN_INFO_3 table holds information about the service lines on the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LN_INGRED_COST_PAID
columns.description: Drug ingredient cost paid.

columns.name: LN_DISP_FEE_PAID
columns.description: Dispensing fee paid.

columns.name: LN_PAT_PAY_AMT
columns.description: Patient pay amount.

columns.name: LN_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: Amount of patient copay.

columns.name: LN_COINS_AMT
columns.description: Amount of patient coinsurance.

columns.name: LN_DEDUCT_AMT
columns.description: Amount of patient deductible.

columns.name: LN_REGLTRY_FEE_AMT
columns.description: Flat sales tax amount paid.

columns.name: LN_PCT_TAX_AMT
columns.description: Percentage tax amount paid.

columns.name: LN_INCENTIVE_AMT
columns.description: Incentive amount paid.

columns.name: LN_OTHR_AMT_RECOGZ
columns.description: Total amount recognized by the processor of any payment from another source.

columns.name: LN_NET_AMT_DUE
columns.description: Net amount paid to provider by the payer.

columns.name: LN_DENT_PROS_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a code indicating if the date for a prior crown/prosthesis is estimated or exact.

columns.name: LN_DENT_PROS_DATE
columns.description: The date a prior crown/prosthesis was previously placed.

columns.name: SVC_DENIED_STATUS_IDENT
columns.description: This stores the external identifier for the denial status of this line.

columns.name: PRCS_IND_CD
columns.description: Claim line level processing indicator code.

columns.name: PRCS_IND_CD_DESC
columns.description: Claim line level processing indicator code description.

columns.name: LN_OPR_TAXONOMY
columns.description: Stores the Line Operating Provider Taxonomy Code.

columns.name: LN_APPLIANCE_REPLACEMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date when an orthodontic appliance was replaced.

columns.name: LN_TREATMENT_START_DATE
columns.description: The date of the initial treatment for a dental service.

columns.name: LN_TREATMENT_COMPLETION_DATE
columns.description: The date of the completed treatment for a dental service.

columns.name: LN_FILL_STATUS
columns.description: Stores information on whether the prescription was completely or partially filled.

columns.name: LN_ORD_TAXONOMY
columns.description: Stores the National Uniform Claim Committee (NUCC) taxonomy code associated with the line-level operating provider

columns.name: LN_APPLIANCE_PLACEMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date when the orthodontic appliance was placed.

columns.name: LN_LIN_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Qualifier code to identify drug code set or the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID.

columns.name: LN_PRESC_PROV_NPI
columns.description: This column holds the National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the provider that prescribed the medication on this service.

columns.name: LN_PRESC_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: This column holds the NUCC Taxonomy Code of the provider that prescribed the medication on this service.

columns.name: LN_SERV_PROV_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the pharmacy that filled the prescription.

columns.name: LN_SERV_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: This column holds the NUCC Taxonomy Code of the pharmacy that filled the prescription.

columns.name: LN_DX_PTR_RANK
columns.description: The comma-delimited list of diagnoses ranks for each diagnosis on a service. Each position here corresponds to the same comma-delimited position of the column LN_DX_PTR from the SVC_LN_INFO table.  The rank here specifies the ranking of diagnoses for the specific service. This can be different than the rank of the same diagnoses at the header-level or even the same diagnoses for a different service.

columns.name: LN_PCP_REF_LAST_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's PCP referring provider's last name.

columns.name: LN_PCP_REF_FIRST_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's PCP referring provider's first name.

columns.name: LN_PCP_REF_MID_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's PCP referring provider's middle name.

columns.name: LN_PCP_REF_SUFFIX_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's PCP referring provider's suffix.

columns.name: LN_PCP_REF_NPI
columns.description: This item stores the line's PCP referring provider's NPI.
